operator<<

Output an error code. 

template<
    typename Elem,
    typename Traits>
std::basic_ostream< Elem, Traits > & operator<<(
    std::basic_ostream< Elem, Traits > & os,
    const error_code & ec);
Requirements

Header: asio/error_code.hpp

Convenience header: asio.hpp
